greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Decimal expansion of proposed value for Avogadro's number, namely 602214141070409084099072 = 84446888^3.
comment: For the exact value for the Avogadro constant is N_A = 6.02214076*10^{23} mol^{-1} according to the 2019 SI system of units see A322578. - _Wolfdieter Lang_, Feb 12 2019
link: R. F. Fox and T. P. Hill, An exact value for Avogadro's number, American Scientist, 95 (No. 2, 2007), 104-107.
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, May 26 2007
